attributes.action: come to a speedy decision on the proposed options for improving the A303 and so protect the Stonehenge World Heritage Site
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Highways Agency conducted a public consultation from January to April 2006 on the recommendation to put the A303 into a Tunnel past Stonehenge. This would improve traffic flow, safety and restore the "dignity and isolation of Britain's greatest prehistoric monument". Other road options were also considered.
